weekly picks (Mar 1 week 2023)

Posted on March 4, 2024 in 2024mar,  Daily t.me,  adsabs,  g scholar

A WordCloud of 2024 Mar 1st week collection

  1. PhysRevX.14.011036 Light-Induced Melting of Competing Stripe Orders without Introducing Superconductivity in La2-xBaxCuO4 (PRX)

  2. PhysRevLett.132.106002 Possible High ${T}_{c}$ Superconductivity in La3Ni2O7 under High Pressure through Manifestation of a Nearly Half-Filled Bilayer Hubbard Model (PRL)

  3. PhysRevLett.132.106301 Nonconservation of the Valley Density and its Implications for the Observation of the Valley Hall Effect (PRL)

  4. 2403.00630 Harnessing the superconducting diode effect through inhomogeneous magnetic fields (arXiv)

  5. 2403.00615 Superconductivity Mediated by Nematic Fluctuations in Tetragonal FeSe1-xSx (arXiv)

  6. 2403.00494 Nonlinear optical responses in superconductors under magnetic fields: quantum geometry and topological superconductivity (arXiv)

  7. 2403.00419 Majorana zero-modes in a dissipative Rashba nanowire (arXiv)

  8. 2403.00316 Surface Chern-Simons theory for third-order topological insulators and superconductors (arXiv)

  9. 2403.00728 Emergence of interfacial magnetism in strongly-correlated nickelate-titanate superlattices (arXiv)

  10. 2403.00597 Chiral Spin Liquid on a Shastry-Sutherland Heisenberg Antiferromagnet (arXiv)

  11. 2403.00421 Monte Carlo based techniques for quantum magnets with long-range interactions (arXiv)

  12. 2403.00062 Strong non-linear response of strange metals (arXiv)

  13. 2403.00007 Marginal Fermi liquid behavior at the onset of 2kF density wave order in two-dimensional metals with flat hot spots (arXiv)

  14. 2403.00477 Robustness of the pyrochlore structure in rare-earth A2Ir2O7 iridates and pressure-induced structural transformation in IrO2 (arXiv)

  15. 2403.00297 Lattice dynamics study of electron-correlation-induced charge density wave in antiferromagnetic kagome metal FeGe (arXiv)

  16. 2403.00714 Entropy Driven Inductive Response of Topological Insulators (arXiv)

  17. 2403.00530 Extended Hubbard corrected tight-binding model for rhombohedral few-layer graphene (arXiv)

  18. 2403.00191 Ab initio modelling of quantum dot qubits: Coupling, gate dynamics and robustness versus charge noise (arXiv)

  19. 2403.00052 Long-lived Topological Flatband Excitons in Semiconductor Moire Heterostructures: a Bosonic Kane-Mele Model Platform (arXiv)

  20. 2403.00538 Asymmetrical temporal dynamics of topological edge modes in Su-Schrieffer-Heeger lattice with Kerr nonlinearity (arXiv)

  21. 2403.00167 Current-induced sliding motion in a helimagnet MnAu2 (arXiv)
